title: The Dating Question You Need To Ask Your Partner!
description:
If you’re starting to get serious with someone right now, there’s one question you need to ask. A while ago, Cassie, our executive vice president, I gave us all the questions you should be asking all your matches on Tinder, Hinge, and Bumble.
Now, Cassie shares with us the follow-up question for when things are getting more serious, and this question would work for couples in relationships/married, too:
What’s the one thing a partner needs to know about you in order for you to be happy?
Nice question, right? But what do you say if that question is a little too straightforward? Listen!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: Pionaire Podcasting

If you’re starting to get serious with someone right now, there’s one question you need to ask. A while ago, Cassie, our executive vice president, I gave us all the questions you should be asking all your matches on Tinder, Hinge, and Bumble.

Now, Cassie shares with us the follow-up question for when things are getting more serious, and this question would work for couples in relationships/married, too:

What’s the one thing a partner needs to know about you in order for you to be happy?

Nice question, right? But what do you say if that question is a little too straightforward? Listen!
